title: UI cleanup for streamlined development workflow
description: Remove cluttered interface elements from development task management to create a focused, distraction-free environment that enhances developer productivity and reduces cognitive overhead
iWant: to simplify the development task interface by removing unnecessary UI elements
soThat: I can provide developers with a cleaner workspace that improves focus and task completion rates
acceptanceCriteria: All unnecessary workflow links are identified and removed
Core development functionality remains fully accessible
UI maintains consistent design patterns after cleanup
